### Reproducibility Checklist
- [ ] Code and data committed.
- [ ] Environment captured.
- [ ] Random seed set.

### Example
> ID: EXP-000
> Hypothesis: Increasing learning rate improves convergence.
> Result: Learning rate 0.01 converged in 5 epochs.
